text: Today, we're learning English with...
Kung Fu Panda!
Aww Yeah!

So, I'm really excited because actually
I'm not going to be teaching today's lesson —

you are going to be learning with your
new RealLife English fluency coach, Andrea!
So, take it away, Andrea.
Thanks, Ethan!

So, today we have a really fun intermediate lesson
for you with some superstar actors,
such as Angelina Jolie, Dustin Hoffman,
Jack Black, Lucy Liu, and Jackie Chan,

who all voiced characters
in this DreamWorks animation.

Kung Fu Panda is about a lazy panda,
and an unlikely hero named Po,

who must somehow become a kung fu master
in order to protect his ancient village
from the villainous snow leopard.

In this lesson, we will help you to learn English
without getting lost,

without missing the jokes,
and without subtitles.

Just like Feriha, who says that
her vocabulary has improved so much

and she's really eager to
learn more from our channel.

So, don't forget to hit that
subscribe button down below

along with the bell, so that you
don't miss a single lesson.

Hey! Real quick — do you want to master
native pronunciation, vocabulary, and even grammar?

Well, the most fun way to do it
is with our Fluent with Friends course,

and today you can try it for FREE with
our 3-Part Master Class.

So, I want to give you three reasons why 
you should try out this 3-Part Master Class:

The first one is VOCABULARY — you will
learn tons of vocabulary,

and not just vocabulary that
you never use and you forget,

but the vocabulary that natives
really use  every single day,
and, we'll also show you how to never forget it.

The second reason is because of
PRONUNCIATION —

you will learn the way that natives really speak —
not at all like how you learned in school.

And, the third reason is because you will learn
the CULTURAL CONTEXT,

so that you will be able to understand
and laugh along with every single joke.

And, in addition to all of this,
if you join our full Fluent with Friends course,
you will never be alone in your learning because you get to join our global community of English learners,
the Fluency Circle.

So, what are you waiting for?
You can try that all for free with our 3-part masterclass

by clicking up here
or down in the description below.

If you're enjoying watching this lesson,
then you'll definitely enjoy watching our lesson
on the classic animation Shrek,

where you'll learn both formal
and informal vocabulary,
with English and Scottish accents.
All you have to do is click this link to watch it.
I hope you enjoyed today's lesson!

And if you did, don't forget to give us
a thumbs up down below,

so that we know you want
more content like this.
Thanks for joining me today!
